thread.title: A Good Location for Exploring Central London -
thread.title_full: A Good Location for Exploring Central London - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rosie5757
title: A Good Location for Exploring Central London -
text: Everything you would expect from a Premier Inn, with a clean room and comfortable bed. A very good location near to the London Eye and within walking distance of Westminster Abbey and the river boats.
